thread.title: India minister's lavish temple offering causes anger
thread.title_full: India minister's lavish temple offering causes anger

title: India minister's lavish temple offering causes anger
text:
India minister's lavish temple offering causes anger 23 February 2017 Image copyright Getty Images Image caption K Chandrashekhar Rao, centre, made the offerings on Wednesday Indian social media users are criticising the chief minister of southern Telangana state for using $750,000 (Â£610,790) of public funds to offer gold at a famous temple. 
K Chandrashekhar Rao on Wednesday offered gold to "thank the gods" for the success of his decade-long campaign to create India's newest state in 2014. 
But Twitter users said the extravagant offering "made no sense". 
Mr Rao faced similar criticism in 2016 when his new home cost taxpayers $7.3m.
